## RemirrorProps.editorStyles property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> use `styles` or `css` prop instead.
> 

Additional editor styles passed into prosemirror. Used to provide styles for the text, nodes and marks rendered in the editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
editorStyles: RemirrorInterpolation;
```
